mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNo desc) as num, c.cartNo, c.userNo, c.productNo, c.productCount, p.productName, p.productPrice, p.productImg1 from cart c inner join product p on c.productNo = p.productNo where c.userNo = #{userNo}
select sum( p.productPrice) as totalprice from cart c inner join product p on c.productNo = p.productNo where c.userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into UserOrder_detail( orderDetailno , orderNo , productNo , productCount , productPrice )select seq_order_detailno.nextval , #{orderNo} , c.productNo , productCount , productPrice from cart c inner join product p on c.productNo = p.productNo
mapper.select: select orderNo , userNo , orderDate , postnum , address1 , address2 , receiverFirstName , receiverLastName , receiverPhone from user_order where userNo = #{userNo}

select o.orderNo, o.userNo, o.orderDate, o.postnum, o.address1, o.address2, o.receiverFirstName, o.receiverLastName, o.receiverPhone, d.orderDetailno, d.productNo, p.productName, p.productImg1, p.productPrice from user_order o inner join userorder_detail d on o.orderNo = d.orderNo inner join product p on d.productNo = p.productNo where o.userNo = #{userNo} and o.orderNo = #{orderNo}
